title: Remove company name from footer copyright and company label

requirements.text: In the Footer component, remove the 'Nebadon Encryption AS' company name text that appears as a standalone element in the footer.
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Nebadon Encryption AS' no longer appears anywhere in the footer
The rest of the footer layout (logo, copyright bar, contact details, address) remains intact

requirements.text: In the Footer component, update the copyright line so that 'Nebadon Encryption' is removed from it, leaving only 'Copyright 2026' (and any remaining attribution such as caffeine.ai).

quotes: der det står copyright 2026 så kan du også fjerne 'Nebadon Encryption'

acceptanceCriteria: The copyright line no longer contains the text 'Nebadon Encryption'
The year '2026' and any caffeine.ai attribution remain on the copyright line
No other footer content is changed

constraints: Do not remove or alter any other footer content such as the Nebacrypt logo, org number, Oslo address, or caffeine.ai attribution
nonGoals: Redesigning or restructuring the footer layout
Changing any header or page content outside the footer
